languages.text: You can advance the level of your character and companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the Koronus Expanse, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.
languages.original_text: Вы можете повысить уровень персонажа и его спутников! За победу в боях, исследование мира и выполнение заданий вы получаете очки опыта — когда их число достигнет определенной отметки, ваш персонаж получит новый уровень. Нажмите на изображение стрелок на портрете, чтобы перейти к окну {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}повышения уровня{/g}. На каждом новом уровне персонажи получают опции развития — эти опции включают выбор новых способностей, талантов, улучшения навыков или других параметров. Спутники получают новые уровни одновременно с вашим персонажем. Даже если они не присутствуют в активной группе во время странствий, вы всегда сможете повысить их уровень позже.

traits.locale_text:
За победу в боях, исследование мира и выполнение заданий вы получаете Очки Опыта.
Когда вы заработаете достаточное количество Очков Опыта, вы сможете повысить уровень персонажа. Новые уровни развития открывают вам доступ к новым способностям и улучшению имеющихся навыков и параметров персонажей.

You can advance the level of your character and their companions! You can advance the level of your character and their companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the Koronus Expanse, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

languages.text: Вы можете повысить уровень персонажа и его спутников! За победу в боях, исследование мира и выполнение заданий вы получаете очки опыта — когда их число достигнет определенной отметки, ваш персонаж получит новый уровень. Нажмите на изображение стрелок на портрете, чтобы перейти к окну {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}повышения уровня{/g}. На каждом новом уровне персонажи получают опции развития — эти опции включают выбор новых способностей, талантов, улучшения навыков или других параметров. Спутники получают новые уровни одновременно с вашим персонажем. Даже если они не присутствуют в активной группе во время странствий, вы всегда сможете повысить их уровень позже.

您可以为您的角色与您所有的同伴进行升级。您可以通过战胜敌人、探索科罗努斯扩区、完成任务来获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}经验{/g}。当您的角色积累了足够的经验之后，等级就会提升。点击角色头像上的箭头符号，即可打开{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}界面。 每当您的角色升级时，都可以获得新的升级选项，包括新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}强化，以及其他强化内容。 当您的角色升级时，您的同伴也同样会升级。即便这些同伴并不在您当前的队伍之中，您也可以后续提升他们的等级。
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the Koronus Expanse, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: 您可以为您的角色与您所有的同伴进行升级。您可以通过战胜敌人、探索科罗努斯扩区、完成任务来获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}经验{/g}。当您的角色积累了足够的经验之后，等级就会提升。点击角色头像上的箭头符号，即可打开{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}界面。 每当您的角色升级时，都可以获得新的升级选项，包括新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}停服{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}强化，以及其他强化内容。 当您的角色升级时，您的同伴也同样会升级。即便这些同伴并不在您当前的队伍之中，您也可以后续提升他们的等级。

languages.text: キャラクターと仲間のレベル上げをしよう！戦闘に勝利して、コロヌス・エクスパンスを探索し、クエストを完了すると{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}経験値{/g}を獲得できる。十分な経験値が溜まると、キャラクターがレベルアップする。ポートレートの矢印をクリックすると、{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}画面が開く。 レベルが上がるごとに、新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}の向上、その他の強化項目などで、キャラクターを育成することができる。 仲間は、あなたのキャラクターと同時にレベルアップする。旅の間、仲間がパーティーに加わっていない場合でも、後でいつでもレベルを上げることができる。
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the Koronus Expanse, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: 自分のキャラクターと仲間のレベル上げをしよう！戦闘に勝利し、コロヌス・エクスパンスを探索し、クエストを完了すると{g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}経験値{/g}を獲得できる。経験値が十分貯まると、キャラクターは新たなレベルに到達する。キャラクターのポートレートの矢印記号をクリックすると、{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルアップ{/g}画面が開く。 レベルが上がるごとに、新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}の向上、その他の強化など、キャラクターの新しい進行オプションが手に入る。 仲間は、あなたのキャラクターと同時に新しいレベルに到達する。旅の間、仲間が活動中のパーティーに加わっていない場合でも、後でいつでもレベルを上げることができる。

languages.text: ¡El nivel de tu personaje y sus compañeros se puede potenciar! Al salir con vida de batallas, explorar la Extensión de Koronus y completar misiones, conseguirás {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}puntos de experiencia{/g}. Cuando hayas acumulado la experiencia suficiente, tu personaje obtendrá un nivel nuevo. Haz clic en el símbolo de las flechas sobre el retrato de un personaje para abrir la pantalla de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Subir de nivel{/g}. A cada nivel que ganen, tus personajes dispondrán de nuevas opciones de progreso, como nuevas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}, mejoras de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} y demás avances. Tus compañeros adquieren niveles nuevos a la par que tu personaje. Aunque no se encuentren en el grupo activo durante tus aventuras, siempre puedes aumentarles el nivel más adelante.
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the Koronus Expanse, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: ¡El nivel de tu personaje y sus compañeros se puede potenciar! Al salir con vida de batallas, explorar la Extensión de Koronus y completar misiones, conseguirás {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}puntos de experiencia{/g}. Cuando hayas acumulado la experiencia suficiente, tu personaje obtendrá un nivel nuevo. Haz clic en el símbolo de las flechas sobre el retrato de un personaje para abrir la pantalla de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Subir de nivel{/g}. A cada nivel que ganen, tus personajes dispondrán de nuevas opciones de progreso, como nuevas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g}, mejoras de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} y demás avances. Tus compañeros adquieren niveles nuevos a la par que tu personaje. Aunque no se encuentren en el grupo activo durante tus aventuras, siempre puedes aumentarles el nivel más adelante.

languages.text: Du kannst die Stufe deines Charakters und deiner Gefährten erhöhen! Wenn du Kämpfe gewinnst, die Koronus-Ausdehnung erkundest und Quests erfüllst, erhältst du {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}Erfahrungspunkte{/g}. Sobald du genug Erfahrung gesammelt hast, steigt dein Charakter in eine neue Stufe auf. Klicke auf das Pfeilsymbol auf dem Porträt deines Charakters, um den {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Stufenaufstiegsbildschirm{/g} aufzurufen. Jede neue Stufe bietet deinen Charakteren neue Aufstiegsmöglichkeiten, wie neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeitsverbesserungen{/g} und andere Erweiterungen. Deine Gefährten zeitgleich mit deinem Charakter auf. Auch wenn sie während deinen Reisen nicht zur aktiven Gruppe gehören, kannst du ihre Stufe später immer noch erhöhen.
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the Koronus Expanse, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst die Stufe deines Charakters und deiner Gefährten erhöhen! Wenn du Kämpfe gewinnst, die Koronus-Ausdehnung erkundest und Quests erfüllst, erhältst du {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}Erfahrungspunkte{/g}. Sobald du genug Erfahrung gesammelt hast, steigt dein Charakter in eine neue Stufe auf. Klicke auf das Pfeilsymbol auf dem Porträt deines Charakters, um den {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}Stufenaufstiegsbildschirm{/g} aufzurufen. Jede neue Stufe bietet deinen Charakteren neue Aufstiegsmöglichkeiten, wie z. B. neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeitsverbesserungen{/g} und andere Erweiterungen. Deine Gefährten steigen zur gleichen Zeit wie dein Charakter auf. Auch wenn sie während deinen Reisen nicht zur aktiven Gruppe gehören, kannst du ihre Stufe später immer noch erhöhen.

languages.text: Vous pouvez améliorer le niveau de votre personnage et de vos compagnons ! Imposez-vous lors des combats, explorez les Étendues de Koronus et accomplissez des quêtes pour gagner des {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}points d'expérience{/g}. Après avoir accumulé suffisamment d'expérience, votre personnage gagne un nouveau niveau. Cliquez sur le symbole des flèches sur le portrait d'un personnage pour ouvrir l'écran de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}niveau supérieur{/g}. Chaque niveau gagné offre à vos personnages de nouvelles options de progression, y compris des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, améliorations de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et autres. Vos compagnons gagnent des niveaux en même temps que votre personnage. S'ils ne font pas partie du groupe actif lors de vos voyages, vous pouvez toujours augmenter leur niveau ultérieurement.
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the Koronus Expanse, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.

traits.locale_text: Vous pouvez améliorer le niveau de votre personnage et de vos compagnons ! Imposez-vous lors des combats, explorez les Étendues de Koronus et accomplissez des quêtes pour gagner des {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}points d'expérience{/g}. Après avoir accumulé suffisamment d'expérience, votre personnage gagne un nouveau niveau. Cliquez sur le symbole des flèches sur le portrait d'un personnage pour ouvrir l'écran de {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}niveau supérieur{/g}. Chaque niveau gagné offre à vos personnages de nouvelles options de progression, incluant des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, améliorations de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} et autres. Vos compagnons gagnent des niveaux en même temps que votre personnage. S'ils ne font pas partie du groupe actif lors de vos voyages, vous pouvez toujours augmenter leur niveau ultérieurement.

languages.text: Karakterinin ve yoldaşlarının seviyelerini yükseltebilirsin! Çatışmalardan galip çıkmak, Koronus Enginliği'ni keşfetmek ve görevleri tamamlamak sana {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}tecrübe puanı{/g} kazandırır. Yeterince tecrübe puanı topladığında, karakterin yeni bir seviye kazanır. Bir karakterin portresindeki ok sembolüne tıklayarak {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}seviye atlama{/g} ekranını açabilirsin. Kazanılan her seviye, karakterlerine yepyeni {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceriler{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} geliştirmeleri gibi yeni gelişim seçenekleri sunar. Yoldaşların ana karakterinle aynı anda seviye atlar. Maceraların sırasında aktif grupta yer almasalar bile, seviyelerini daha sonra dilediğin zaman artırabilirsin.
languages.original_text: You can advance the level of your character and companions! Prevailing in battles, exploring the Koronus Expanse, and completing quests earns you {g|Encyclopedia:ExperiencePoints}experience points{/g}. Once you have accumulated enough experience, your character gains a new level. Click on the arrows symbol on a character's portrait to open the {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}level up{/g} screen. Each level gained offers your characters new progression options, which include new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} improvements, and other enhancements. Your companions gain new levels at the same time as your character. Even if they are not included in the active party during your journeys, you can always increase their level later.
